name: Robo Rapture (Vatredox)
description:
In this Catholic hack and slash survival game, you play as Archbishop Annihilation. Your goal is to fend off waves of hellish robots using your staff and the strength bestowed upon you by the Holy Spirit.

Use WASD to move, spacebar to jump, and the mouse to look around. Left click to attack.

This game was created as a submission to the Indie Game Dev Beginners Game Jam March 2023, which lasted for 7 days. The theme was "robots."

P.S. Sorry I couldn't get it to run in the browser - it was too laggy.
